Text.text: 1. Click the Save button on your request from the last tutorial
2. Add a saying name and click the + Create Collection Button and give your collection as good name, like MVA.

FormattedText.htmlText: 3. Click the ✓ button and press Save

Text.text: Click the ... on your collection and choose edit
3. Click the Authorization tab and set it to Basic Auth with user 250004 and password Myhr1234. Press Save
4. On your request, click the Authorization tab and set it to inherit auth from parent

MessageStrip.text: Now we don't have to maintain the Authorization every time and can rely on the collections Authorization instead

Text.text: 5. Click the PreRequest Script tab and change line 12 to pm.collectionVariables.set('csrf-token',Â token.value)

MessageStrip.text: This way the x-csrf-token is set on the collection and we don't have to request it again
